source: Columbus & Central Ohio Regional MLS via Columbus REALTORS

westerville.name: Westerville
westerville.notes: Homes typically sell within 3 weeks. Inventory up 25% year-over-year.

columbus.name: Columbus
columbus.notes: Wide price variation by neighborhood. Urban core seeing strong appreciation.

dublin.name: Dublin
dublin.notes: Strong school district demand. New construction in Bridge Park area.

gahanna.name: Gahanna
gahanna.notes: Popular with families. Creekside development adding appeal.

powell.name: Powell
powell.notes: Olentangy schools drive demand. Limited inventory.

new-albany.name: New Albany
new-albany.notes: Planned community with strong amenities. Higher price points.

hilliard.name: Hilliard
hilliard.notes: Fast-selling market. Strong school district appeal.

delaware.name: Delaware
delaware.notes: Growing area with new construction. Mix of rural and suburban.

_updateInstructions.frequency: Monthly, around the 20th when Columbus REALTORS releases new data
steps: 1. Visit Columbus REALTORS housing reports page
2. Download the latest monthly report PDF
4. Update metro-level stats from the 'Stats' section
5. Update area stats from the 'Areas' section (filter by city)
